en.title: Bachelor's in Materials and Metallurgical Engineering
en.description: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Materials and Metallurgical Engineering, focusing on materials science, metallurgy, and engineering principles. Developed a strong foundation in engineering concepts and practical applications through hands-on projects and research.
en.institution: Enugu State University of Science and Technology

nl.title: Bachelor in Materialen en Metallurgische Technologie
nl.description: Behaalde een bachelor in Materialen en Metallurgische Technologie, met focus op materiaalkunde, metallurgie en technische principes. Ontwikkelde een sterke basis in technische concepten en praktische toepassingen door middel van hands-on projecten en onderzoek.
nl.institution: Enugu State University of Science and Technology

en.title: Post Graduate Diploma in Information and Management Technology
en.description: Earned a Post Graduate Diploma in Information and Management Technology, focusing on algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and web development. Gained hands-on experience through various programming projects, coding boot camps, and many collaborative team-based software development activities.

nl.title: Post Graduate Diploma in Informatie- en Managementtechnologie
nl.description: Behaalde een [[postgraduate diploma in Informatie- en Managementtechnologie]], met focus op algoritmen, datastructuren, software engineering en webontwikkeling. Verworven praktische ervaring door middel van verschillende programmeerprojecten, coding boot camps en veel samenwerkingsgerichte softwareontwikkelingsactiviteiten.

en.title: Master's in Information Technology
en.description: Completed a [[Master's degree in Software Engineering]], specializing in software development methodologies, system architecture, and project management. Engaged in advanced coursework and collaborative projects to enhance software engineering skills.

nl.title: {{Master}} in Software Engineering
nl.description: Voltooide een [[master in Software Engineering]], met specialisatie in softwareontwikkelingsmethodologieÃ«n, systeemarchitectuur en projectmanagement. Betrokken bij geavanceerde cursussen en samenwerkingsprojecten om software-engineeringvaardigheden te verbeteren.
